markdownRemark.html: Located in Alhaurin de la Torre, 15 minutes from Malaga and Torremolinos, this club has a manor house with a gym, a restaurant with an Andalusian patio and club offices. Also the facilities include 13 padel courts, 5 tennis courts, a swimming pool and gardens with a summer restaurant as well as parking for members of the sports club.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis Alhaurin de la Torre
frontmatter.description: Club de Tenis Alhaurin de la Torre - Located in Alhaurin de la Torre, 15 minutes from Malaga and Torremolinos, this club has a manor house with a gym, a restaurant with an Andalusian patio and club offices. Also the facilities include 13 padel courts, 5 tennis courts, a swimming pool and gardens with a summer restaurant as well as parking for members of the sports club.
frontmatter.address: Av. de la Música, 120, 29130 Alhaurín de la Torre, Málaga
tags: Top things to do with kids in Costa del Sol
